title: SOC 2 Evidence Gathering
description: This document provides guidance on how to gather the evidence needed for SOC 2 certification purposes. We will cover the types of evidence that our auditors typically request for the controls that are not monitored by  Drata, as well as best practices for collecting and organizing the evidence.
